Title: Enacts the "New York state phoenix act"
Summary: Enacts the "New York State Phoenix Act"; extends the statute of limitations for felony family offenses to ten years and misdemeanor family offenses to five years.
LawCode: Amd §30.10, CP L; amd §§214-b & 840, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the executive law, in relation to enacting the "New York State Phoenix Act"
